name: @financialforcedev/orizuru-transport-rabbitmq
description: Rabbitmq transport layer for the orizuru package

scripts.build: npm run build-clean && npm run build-compile && npm run build-copy
scripts.build-copy: mkdir -p dist/docker/setup && npm run build-copy-docker && npm run build-copy-docker-setup
scripts.build-copy-docker: cp docker/rabbitmq.dockerfile dist/docker && cp docker/docker-compose.yaml dist/docker
scripts.clean: rm -rf coverage* && rm -rf dist && rm -rf node_modules && rm -f *.tgz
scripts.docker-cleanup: npm run docker-cleanup-containers && npm run docker-cleanup-images
scripts.docker-cleanup-containers: docker ps --filter=name='ffdc/*' --format '{{.ID}}' -a | xargs docker stop | xargs docker rm
scripts.docker-start: npm run docker-cleanup && npm run docker-build && npm run docker-start-services
scripts.posttest: npm run docker-start && npm run coverage-system

author: financialforce
